name: bulk_follow_users
description: Follow multiple X/Twitter users in parallel. Skips users you already follow.

detailSteps.code: const followBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="-follow"]'); const unfollowBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="-unfollow"]'); const username = window.location.pathname.replace('/', ''); if (unfollowBtn) return { status: 'already_following', username: username }; if (followBtn) { followBtn.click(); return { status: 'followed', username: username }; } return { status: 'button_not_found', username: username }
detailSteps.name: follow_result
detailSteps.label: Follow user
